name: Amazon
description: Amazone Alexa Is Powerfull whatsapp bot For Whatsapp

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en,  Malayalam => ml, Indonesia => ID

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_VIDEO.description: If you likes video you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_BIO.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

BOT_NAME.description: give a name you disire to give your bot (for auto reply white to identify)

WHATS_LINK_BLOCK.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks whatsapp group  link

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 947xxxx && 947xxxx-1xxx or 947xxxx,947xxx...(sri lanka)

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Bot Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.and if you use â€œadminâ€, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adÄ±. Heroku APP Name.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter -angela- for talking angela - enter -Tom- for Talking tom

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

INBOX_BLOCK.description: Activate Inbox Block System true or false

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

BOT_PRESENCE.description: Type the Presence of bot, presences: online => Always Shows the online, offline => Always Shows offline, typing => Always Shows typing, recording => Always Shows recording.. NOTE : THE PRESENCE WILL BE PERMANENT, UNTIL THE BOT IS ALIVE / RUNNING / WORKING
